properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 9:40AM CST until January 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Winds 25 knots with gusts to Gale force possible. Seas
4 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX out
20 NM, Coastal waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA out
20 NM and Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to
Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 AM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY
